duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct market research on industry trends relevant to the media industry, specifically within the LATAM region.
Influence the adaptability of projects as needed for the US Hispanic audience and bring new ideas and project opportunities.
Evaluate and make recommendations related to storylines, cultural appeal, complexity, likability, as well as technical aspects such as direction and production design.
Analyze the historical performance of properties, competitors, and consumer behaviors to make informed scripted content strategy recommendations and decisions.
Maintain strong communication with the Acquisition team, evaluating their acquisition portfolio and making recommendations on content aligned with business and audience strategy.
Prepare weekly reports on market data, metrics, and analysis for leadership review and programming decisions.
